pullRequest.title: [RW-5462][risk=no] Endpoint for COPE survey versions
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is adding 2 new endpoints for the COPE survey versions. There are 2 ways to call for survey versions. With question concept id or question concept id and answer concept id.

findSurveyVersionByQuestionConceptId(cdrVersionId, surveyConceptId, questionConceptId)
findSurveyVersionByQuestionConceptIdAndAnswerConceptId(cdrVersionId, surveyConceptId, questionConceptId, answerConceptId)

nodes.bodyText: Should we also add a negative test say if itemCount is null?

Question: here we have sum(csa.item_count) vs just returning csa.item_count in method findSurveyVersionByQuestionConceptIdAndAnswerConceptId ,
Is it because  for findSurveyVersionByQuestionConceptId,  its aggregating the item_count of all answers for question_id passed?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -249,4 +250,35 @@
           "select distinct domain_id as domain, type, is_standard as standard from cb_criteria order by domain, type, is_standard",
       nativeQuery = true)
   List<DbMenuOption> findMenuOptions();
+
+  @Query(
+      value =
+          "select surveyId, version, itemCount from( "
+              + "select csv.survey_id as surveyId, csv.version as version, sum(csa.item_count) as itemCount, csv.display_order "
